summary: Got this armor off steam workshop and found it didnt show up, help fix plz
descriptionHtml:
So i found this armor (Fox armor from Blade and Souls) on the steam workshop, i downloaded it and found it just made my body dissapear. the uploader got more of these comments and told me that they took it down cause they didnt know what was wrong with it, it worked fine for them.

If anyone is looking for a challenge that gives a good looking armor, here ya go (just send me a copy when you done plz =))

according to the uploader you need caliente body mod, they used slim but it supposed to work with slim and curvey.
author: khead
